tool_description: Sends appointment-related notifications to patients and providers via multiple channels including SMS, email, and automated calls with customizable templates.

notification_type.description: Type of notification: appointment_confirmation, appointment_reminder, appointment_cancellation, appointment_modification, wait_list_update

recipient_phone.description: Recipient phone number for SMS notifications

recipient_email.description: Recipient email address for email notifications

error_messages: Invalid notification_type: Must be one of [appointment_confirmation, appointment_reminder, appointment_cancellation, appointment_modification, wait_list_update]
No contact method: At least one of recipient_phone or recipient_email must be provided
Invalid phone format: Phone number must be in valid format with country code
Invalid email format: Email address must be in valid format
Invalid channels: Channels must be from [sms, email, voice_call]
Channel mismatch: SMS requires recipient_phone, email requires recipient_email
usage: Specify notification_type, recipient contact info, appointment details, and preferred channels. The tool sends notifications and tracks delivery status.

notification_id.description: Unique identifier for the sent notification

delivery_status.description: Overall delivery status: sent, delivered, failed, pending

channel_results.description: Delivery results for each channel used
